#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<string>
#include<string.h>
#include<cstring>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<cassert>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long int
#define PII pair<int,int>
#define PB push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define BIG 10000000000000000LL
inline bool isSq(LL num)
{
    LL sq=(LL)sqrt(num);
    while(sq*sq<num)
       sq++;
    return (sq*sq)==num;
}
set <LL> nums;
int main()
{
    for(LL i=2;i<=300000;i++)
     {
        LL cur=i*i;
        nums.insert(cur);
        while(cur<=(BIG/i+1))
        {
            cur*=i;
            nums.insert(cur);
        }
    }
    LL t,num;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>num;
        if(nums.find(num)!=nums.end() || isSq(num))
            cout<<"YES\n";
        else
            cout<<"NO\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
